item.title: Chithira Pournami Vilakku Poojai
item.description: Register for Online Vilakku Poojai. Cost will be $9 for each participating person. System Requirements: A computer, iPad, tablet or smart-phone with Zoom software installed would be ideal for the video conferencing. But for folks who do not have a computer or you're computer challenged -- no worries, we have you covered :-) You can still participate by calling into the conference line during the event using a simple telephone.
